name: portfolio-3.0
description: In the project directory, you can run:

scripts.frontend-build: cd frontend && yarn run build && cd ..
scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd frontend && yarn && yarn run build && cd ..
scripts.git-sync-master: git checkout develop && git pull origin develop && git push origin develop && git checkout master && git pull origin master && git merge --no-edit develop && git push origin master && git checkout develop
